descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# A Magical Pet #

**Meet Ember, Your New Best Friend** 
- She'll bring magic and mischief into your home, and take you on an adventure in her fantastical world.

[media]
 

# A Living World #
- Ember’s world is full of creatures to chase and ways to interact.

[media]

# A Friend Who's Always There #
- Ember shares your home, always there to play with, care for, or snuggle on the couch after a long day.

[media]
# Endless Ways to Play #
- You and Ember work as a team to harvest resources, banish thorny weeds, and explore the mysterious Otherlands.

[media]

# Collect, Trade, Buy  #
- Forage resources and trade them in trade for new toys and clothes to suit your Ember’s unique look and personality.

[media]


Stay: Forever Home by the creators of **Bogo** and **First Steps**

# A Magical Pet #

**Meet Ember, Your New Best Friend** 
- She'll bring magic and mischief into your home, and take you on an adventure in her fantastical world.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499623592_1242411587354095_8518052294169653959_n.mp4?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=rXCo2cT_69oQ7kNvwEtF0Su&_nc_oc=AdkJv6m4pDJhyb8w1dAOB3lLNXuVGSoaLtj7j9eLeMUWciCUTdYdp9XR5aj-1yTzaG4&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=bJMdSMl8TS3SMxcAOnsn6Q&oh=00_AfucZ1V_YQ0GphYtUT8SidDF6IyqeESnHv51uDFhyFsAfQ&oe=69896810)
 

# A Living World #
- Ember’s world is full of creatures to chase and ways to interact.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491824697_1278851210611188_4094365675689352297_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=p6Xo7h0s4J8Q7kNvwHYh0b_&_nc_oc=Adn7wv_3DrsWX58K7R4KdKcVt8rX_Ttp6vnCX12l3T-aMtQOh_pspEFvJZG8Ojd4DoI&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=bJMdSMl8TS3SMxcAOnsn6Q&oh=00_AfsVDnB1yqhXCSs18c_Q-BAmE22Oai_JlyIp0MphJkXpbg&oe=69895196)

# A Friend Who's Always There #
- Ember shares your home, always there to play with, care for, or snuggle on the couch after a long day.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499292426_1471237290743467_5955331649547554072_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=HYTr7tUkKtoQ7kNvwFUp-UT&_nc_oc=AdnEZTqFJ10nyXKUw4_Qd4CSuA4ZsCV4D-fc9IOJMx0WKDOcAOc80Ggtfo28mE-67oY&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=bJMdSMl8TS3SMxcAOnsn6Q&oh=00_Afvo5IFCCGSP5Pqup8z94Sg8k2fr4Hgf3SYwwufUUwZU3A&oe=69895C85)
# Endless Ways to Play #
- You and Ember work as a team to harvest resources, banish thorny weeds, and explore the mysterious Otherlands.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499299164_23905805109048560_5254487432958572571_n.mp4?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=CL9kGLIC8iYQ7kNvwG1_23_&_nc_oc=Adl8l_z1OE9KLjh-4SCWIq3oOnX4Ta0nhvP1w3o6yaYnvcbFb5JZD14rkCUBOslMNro&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=bJMdSMl8TS3SMxcAOnsn6Q&oh=00_AfvwqzBnGo0YDLXpJgkvepVFguwv8l8Hsk0h_awFL3WOiA&oe=69894F27)

# Collect, Trade, Buy  #
- Forage resources and trade them in trade for new toys and clothes to suit your Ember’s unique look and personality.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491819854_2661665637369878_2167100156395054220_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=WiDMRxClpVMQ7kNvwHwbH39&_nc_oc=AdljoIMdDfNbLof0NZFHVc4fO7KhLVFlBYSwOlu_oIFMbQ38QIIqnRqfBVWhsqaz8qQ&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=bJMdSMl8TS3SMxcAOnsn6Q&oh=00_Afs4tjG4fgZZaBYOff7KgkaMgzRnR6NIJ4zSMh8ZcBiARQ&oe=69894E29)
